title: About
text: This cite is maintained by Logan S. Edmondson. You are at full liberty to plagiarize, rip off, pirate, or otherwise steal content from this site to the extent that you see fit at this point in time. I do not care. It’d be nice if you cited me, but if not, I will not yell at you.

title: Welcome!
text:
I am a second year PhD student at the University of Missouri, working under the mentorship of Dr. Keely Dugan. My research primarily focuses on understanding the social and contextual factors that underly personality development. I am especially interested in the role that geography plays in personality development. Other interests include trait assessment and social network dynamics, with a focus on factors that predict relationship dissolution.







Outside of my research, I enjoy NBA basketball, spending time with my dog, Mike, and reading science fiction and fantasy.
